name: Mortality's Cinders
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You touch a willing creature and burn away the limits of mortality upon them, for a time. For the duration of the spell, they can't heal any hit points, but add your spellcasting modifier to every roll they make. When the target makes a successful attack or saving throw, they take 1d12 damage, which can't be reduced or prevented in any way. Half of this damage reduces the target's maximum hit points by the same amount.

This spell can only be ended early while taking a break.
